feed.title: PipisCrew
feed.subtitle: A minimal, portfolio, sidebar, bootstrap Jekyll theme with responsive web design and focuses on text presentation.

entry.title: Wind-up Knight
entry.summary: Is a high-end, action-packed, 3D side-scrolling adventure game, and it’s here to show you how games are supposed to be played. Guide your Wind-up Knight through devilish levels–over 50 in all–to rescue the Princess from the clutches of the evil Black Knight. Run, jump, roll, and slash your way to victory. Not your typical runner game, Wind-up Knight is the type of challenging game you’ve been m...

entry.title: o[javascript] jQuery Datepicker
entry.summary: A jQuery plugin that attaches a popup calendar to your input fields or shows an inline calendar for selecting individual dates or date ranges. http://keith-wood.name/datepick.HTML [javascript] $(function() { $(‘#dtpicker’).calendarsPicker({ dateFormat: “dd/mm/yyyy”, minDate: +1, maxDate: +90, }); });//jQuery Ends <input id="dtpicker" placeholder="Arrival Date" required="...
